meanings.definition: A person who creates a representation or simulation of something.
meanings.sent1: The modellers carefully crafted a miniature city for the exhibition.
meanings.sent2: The team of modellers worked together to build a scale model of the new bridge.
meanings.sent3: The modellers joked that their tiny replica of the Eiffel Tower was taller than the original!
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a team of modellers, shaping ideas into tangible forms.
meanings.sent5: The modellers' attention to detail brought the historical scene to life.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in the practice of creating models.
meanings.sent1: Many modellers enjoy the challenge of recreating famous landmarks in miniature.
meanings.sent2: The group of modellers met regularly to share tips and techniques.
meanings.sent3: The modellers proudly displayed their collection of model airplanes at the museum.
meanings.sent4: In their hands, the modellers held the power to replicate reality in small scale.
meanings.sent5: The modellers' passion for precision was evident in every model they created.

meanings.definition: People who design or construct models.
meanings.sent1: The modellers used various materials like clay and wood to build their models.
meanings.sent2: Skilled modellers can transform simple materials into intricate works of art.
meanings.sent3: The modellers' workshop was filled with the hum of creativity and the smell of paint.
meanings.sent4: Like architects of the small, the modellers shaped worlds within their hands.
meanings.sent5: The modellers' dedication to their craft was evident in the precision of their models.
